description.zh-cn: 清朝乾隆及嘉庆时期人物，满洲正红旗人，权臣和珅的长子。其妻为乾隆帝幼女固伦和孝公主。他的一生经历了父亲倒台后的荣辱沉浮。
description.en: A figure during the Qianlong and Jiaqing eras of the Qing dynasty, a member of the Manchu Plain Red Banner, and the eldest son of the powerful official Heshen. His wife was Princess Gurun Hexiao, the youngest daughter of the Qianlong Emperor. His life was marked by fluctuations in fortune after his father's downfall.

description.zh-cn: 清朝乾隆时期的权臣，丰绅殷德的父亲，后被嘉庆帝赐死。
description.en: A powerful official during the Qianlong era of the Qing dynasty, father of Fengshen Yinde, who was later forced to commit suicide by the Jiaqing Emperor.

description.zh-cn: 和珅的嫡妻，丰绅殷德的生母，英廉的孙女。
description.en: The primary wife of Heshen, biological mother of Fengshen Yinde, and granddaughter of Yinglian.

description.zh-cn: 清朝公主，乾隆帝的幼女，丰绅殷德的妻子。
description.en: A Qing dynasty princess, the youngest daughter of the Qianlong Emperor, and the wife of Fengshen Yinde.

description.zh-cn: 清朝第六位皇帝，固伦和孝公主的父亲，丰绅殷德的岳父。
description.en: The sixth emperor of the Qing dynasty, father of Princess Gurun Hexiao, and father-in-law of Fengshen Yinde.

description.zh-cn: 乾隆帝的妃子，固伦和孝公主的生母。
description.en: A consort of the Qianlong Emperor and the biological mother of Princess Gurun Hexiao.

description.zh-cn: 清朝第七位皇帝。他赐死了和珅，并多次对丰绅殷德进行惩罚和任命。
description.en: The seventh emperor of the Qing dynasty. He ordered the death of Heshen and repeatedly punished and appointed Fengshen Yinde.

description.zh-cn: 清朝中期的民间宗教秘密结社，曾发动大规模起义。其平定后的大赦使丰绅殷德一度复爵。
description.en: A syncretic religious and political movement in the mid-Qing dynasty that launched a major rebellion. The amnesty following its suppression led to the temporary restoration of Fengshen Yinde's title.

description.zh-cn: 固伦和孝公主府的长史，曾诬告丰绅殷德谋反。
description.en: The chief of staff in Princess Gurun Hexiao's household, who once falsely accused Fengshen Yinde of treason.

description.zh-cn: 丰绅殷德的嗣子（养子）。
description.en: The adopted son of Fengshen Yinde.

description.zh-cn: 清朝官员，冯氏（和珅嫡妻）的祖父。
description.en: A Qing dynasty official and the grandfather of Lady Feng (Heshen's primary wife).

description.zh-cn: 满洲八大姓氏之一，是丰绅殷德所属的氏族。
description.en: One of the eight great Manchu clans, to which Fengshen Yinde belonged.

description.zh-cn: 丰绅殷德是和珅的长子。
description.en: Fengshen Yinde was the eldest son of Heshen.

description.zh-cn: 丰绅殷德的生母是和珅的嫡妻冯氏。
description.en: Fengshen Yinde's biological mother was Heshen's primary wife, Lady Feng.

description.zh-cn: 丰绅殷德的正妻是乾隆帝的幼女固伦和孝公主。
description.en: Fengshen Yinde's primary wife was Princess Gurun Hexiao, the youngest daughter of the Qianlong Emperor.

description.zh-cn: 固伦和孝公主是乾隆帝的幼女。
description.en: Princess Gurun Hexiao was the youngest daughter of the Qianlong Emperor.

description.zh-cn: 固伦和孝公主的生母是惇妃汪氏。
description.en: The biological mother of Princess Gurun Hexiao was Consort Dun, of the Wang clan.

description.zh-cn: 乾隆帝是丰绅殷德的岳父。
description.en: The Qianlong Emperor was Fengshen Yinde's father-in-law.

description.zh-cn: 惇妃是丰绅殷德的岳母。
description.en: Consort Dun was Fengshen Yinde's mother-in-law.

description.zh-cn: 福恩是丰绅殷德的嗣子（养子）。
description.en: Fu'en was the adopted son of Fengshen Yinde.

description.zh-cn: 冯氏是英廉的孙女。
description.en: Lady Feng was the granddaughter of Yinglian.

description.zh-cn: 冯氏是和珅的嫡妻。
description.en: Lady Feng was the primary wife of Heshen.

description.zh-cn: 嘉庆四年（1799年）正月，嘉庆帝赐死和珅。
description.en: In the first month of the fourth year of the Jiaqing era (1799), the Jiaqing Emperor ordered Heshen to commit suicide.

description.zh-cn: 1799年，因和珅案被夺职，削夺伯爵爵位；1803年，因国服期间与侍妾行房生女属实，被削去散秩大臣职务和伯爵爵位。
description.en: In 1799, he was stripped of his position and the title of Earl due to the Heshen case; in 1803, he was stripped of his position as Grand Minister of the Imperial Household and his title of Earl because it was confirmed that he had a child with a concubine during the national mourning period.

description.zh-cn: 1806年，丰绅殷德出任头等侍卫、满洲镶蓝旗副都统，并恢复伯爵；1810年，晋公爵位。
description.en: In 1806, Fengshen Yinde was appointed as a First-Class Imperial Guard and Deputy Commander of the Manchu Bordered Blue Banner, and his title of Earl was restored; in 1810, he was promoted to the rank of Duke.

description.zh-cn: 嘉庆七年（1802年），清廷因平定白莲教起事后大赦天下，使得丰绅殷德得以恢复伯爵爵位。
description.en: In the seventh year of the Jiaqing era (1802), the Qing court granted a general amnesty after suppressing the White Lotus Rebellion, which allowed Fengshen Yinde to have his title of Earl restored.

description.zh-cn: 嘉庆八年（1803年），奎福诬告丰绅殷德谋反及国服期间产女等事，导致后者被削去职务和爵位。
description.en: In the eighth year of the Jiaqing era (1803), Kuifu falsely accused Fengshen Yinde of treason and of having a child during a national mourning period, which led to the latter being stripped of his position and title.

description.zh-cn: 丰绅殷德出身于满洲钮祜禄氏。
description.en: Fengshen Yinde was from the Manchu Niohuru clan.
